name: sb10f
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0
body: |- wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wsb(s2, s1, w0))))

comment: Hao Wang's identity axiom P6 in Irving Copi, _Symbolic Logic_ (5th ed., 1979), p. 328. In traditional predicate calculus, this is a sole axiom for identity from which the usual ones can be derived. (Contributed by NM, 9-May-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Oct-2016.)
